title: Moonwalk
creator_credit: Learning Corporation of America, Dean Gitter Productions, Peretz Johnnes and Theo Kamecke
brief_description: A record of the journey that culminated in man’s first step on the moon, covering the spectacular blastoff, the lunar landing and the return to earth. Effective use of music, sound effects and slow motion. Includes images taken from inside the lunar module.
creator_credit_for_label: Learning Corporation of America, Dean Gitter Productions, Peretz Johnnes and Theo Kamecke
